segments.text: Susan , Is the manager in this office ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . But he is meeting a client .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , that's too bad . I just got a phone call saying that my wife is now in the hospital . She is going to deliver a baby . I must take the day off to go to the hospital . May I talk to him to ask for leave ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am afraid not , but I think I could convey your leave to him after the client goes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , that's very kind of you . Thank you very much . I've got to go .
segments.speaker: S1
